English.Text: You can't help but feel you paid rather a lot for the last-minute tailoring, which in fairness the costumier hammers out with astonishing calm. You get changed and observe the result in the long mirror â€” what you see is reminiscent of Alice's cheshire cat, or better, that pussy cat famously employed to fetch royal mice. You meow past the casino doormen, and once inside, debate your best bet for finding the Queen.
